Title: Allows consumers the right to request from businesses the categories of personal information a business has sold or disclosed to third parties
Summary: Grants a consumer a right to request a business to disclose the categories and specific pieces of personal information that it collects about the consumer, the categories of sources from which that information is collected, the business purposes for collecting or selling the information, and the categories of third parties with which the information is shared.
LawCode: Amd Art 39-F Art Head, add ยง899-cc, Gen Bus L; add 99-ii, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law and the state finance law, in relation to allowing consumers the right to request from businesses the categories of personal information the business has sold or disclosed to third parties
